trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 64-bit signed integer objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，將 64 位元帶正負號的整數物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: This converter can only convert a 64-bit signed integer object to and from a string.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子只可以將轉換的 64 位元帶正負號的整數物件與字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int64> value type represents integers with values ranging from negative 9,223,372,036,854,775,808 through positive 9,223,372,036,854,775,807.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A> method of <xref:System.Int64> with the integer value of <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>方法會使用<xref:System.Int64.Parse%2A>方法<xref:System.Int64>的整數值與<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method uses the general ("G") format for the string returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A>方法會傳回字串的使用一般 ("G") 格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。

trans-unit.source: You should never create an instance of an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int64Converter>.
trans-unit.target: 您絕對不要建立的執行個體<xref:System.ComponentModel.Int64Converter>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The following sample converts a variable of type <xref:System.Int64> to a string, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將轉換類型的變數<xref:System.Int64>為字串，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Int64Converter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Int64Converter" /> 類別的新執行個體。
